data.title: IBM : Digital Ecosystem Day
data.meta_description: Our speaker lineup for Digital Ecosystem Day is here! Get ready to be inspired by the best in the industry on Wednesday, June 5, 2024

She joined PT Metrodata Electronics Tbk from various accountancy fields before being promoted to Finance Controller. Surhang Aiwan was appointed Company Director in 2011, and later the President Director of a subsidiary PT Synnex Metrodata Indonesia on January 2024.

Graduated with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical Engineering from Trisakti University, Jakarta, in 1985, he started his career with the Company in 1986.

He was promoted to Division Manager in 1995 and later the President Director of a subsidiary, PT Synnex Metrodata Indonesia, on May 1, 2000.

He was appointed the Companyâ€™s Director on June 26, 2000 and still holds the position until now.

Graduated with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical Engineering from Trisakti University, Jakarta, in 1985, he started his career with the Company in 1986.

He was promoted to Division Manager in 1995 and later the President Director of a subsidiary, PT Synnex Metrodata Indonesia, on May 1, 2000.

He was appointed the Companyâ€™s Director on June 26, 2000 and still holds the position until now.

Yulius was appointed Company Director in January 2019. In that role, he is responsible for leading national sales & marketing.

He joined in 2008 as a Business Representative at PT Metrodata e-Bisnis (before becoming PT Synnex Metrodata Indonesia in 2012).

Before being appointed as Company Director, he served as Division Manager from 2012 and also Associate Director in 2016.

He went through several roles and positions in the company both as product management and sales management in various divisions such as IT, Mobile Phones and others, bringing him to his current position.

He started his career in 2004 at AV Concept Singapore Pte Ltd as a Sales Engineer for Indonesia Representative Office.

He received his Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electronics Engineering Telecommunication from Atma Jaya University, Jakarta, Indonesia

Lie Heng was appointed Company Director in May 2014.

He joined PT Metrodata Electronics Tbk in 2010. Before being appointed as Company Director that focuses on Solution Product, he served as General Manager Hardware & Software Group in 2010. He has acquired diverse technical business perspectives through many of his business partnerships with multi vendors categories.

Lie Heng started his career as Web Developer of Money in Minutes, Los Angeles, California, USA in 2003; Business Development Director at PT Era Business Solutions; and Leader Channel Manager at PT Computrade Technology International.

He received his Bachelorâ€™s degree of Commerce with High Honors in Management Information System, Carleton University, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada in 2002.

Ronaldy was appointed Company Director in 2015.

In that role, he is responsible for the distribution of IT client products, Smartphones, and Gaming products. Prior to his current role, Ronaldy served as Division Manager in 2011. He spent over 16 years on his career in IT Industry.

He started his career in 2005 at PT Metrodata e-Bisnis (before becoming PT Synnex Metrodata Indonesia in 2012).

He received his Masterâ€™s degree in Information System Management in 2005 and a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science in 2003 from Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia.
